title: MRD before or after death of spouse ?
text:
Hello

I have not been on Morningstar in a while and I am totally confused by this new format.

Can someone please help me with my question regarding MRD for my husband.

He probably will pass away in the next few weeks if not sooner. We are wondering if I should take his Fidelity MRD for 2019 now before he passes or later. I am also taking MRDs on My Fidelity account.

Is there an advantage in taking his MRD's before he passes ? Should I wait until his IRAs are combined with mine ? I am 14 years younger than he is. He is 86. I am 72.

This is all so stressful. Thank you for any advice.
